name: GreedHate
title: Captain Freaks Out!
rules: The player with the most Obsessions Gets Shot!

name: GreedKill
title: Captain Shoots wildly!
rules: The players who don't have the least Obsessions Get Shot!

name: GreedApathy
title: Loading the Gun!
rules: Play one more round. The player with the most Obsessions Gets Shot!

name: GreedGifts
title: Captain gives gifts.
rules: Coins are worth double points, and are awarded bonus points as if they were items.

name: GreedCranky
title: Captain gets cranky!
rules: The player(s) with the most items lose 2 items each.

name: behavior.Hoodwink
title: Hoodwink

name: Captain
rulesNotAbility: When play reaches the Captain, discard the rightmost behavior card, and reveal a new Greed card.
rule3of3: When a behavior card is full, discard it and reveal a new Greed card.
